data.name: Features_Section1_Content
data.value: Sign up for free and start monitoring your data. No setup, no credit card, no training. With our simple out-of-the box dashboards for services like Salesforce, Google Analytics, and Dynamics, you can get insights from your data in no time.

data.name: Features_Section1_Heading
data.value: Get started in seconds

data.name: Features_Section2_Content
data.value: Excel spreadsheets, cloud services, streaming data, and on-premises databases — no matter where your data lives or what form it’s in, you get a holistic view of the key metrics for your business.

data.name: Features_Section2_Heading
data.value: All your data, wherever it is

data.name: Features_Section3_Content
data.value: Instantly know when your business needs your attention with real-time Power BI dashboards. Solve problems as they occur and seize opportunities as soon as they arise.

data.name: Features_Section3_Heading
data.value: Be informed: always real time

data.name: Features_Section4_Content
data.value: Imagine asking "What were last year's sales by product?" and getting a stunning, interactive visualization as an answer. With Power BI, you ask questions in natural language and get the right charts and graphs as your answer.

data.name: Features_Section4_Heading
data.value: Ask questions, get answers

data.name: Features_Section5_Content
data.value: Create and publish content packs to your team or your entire organization. Your content packs include dashboards, reports, and datasets that provide every user with a personalized view of their business metrics that matter most.

data.name: Features_Section5_Heading
data.value: Curated content, just for your organization

data.name: Features_Section6_Content
data.value: Empower your team to make quick, confident decisions with a single view of your business. Power BI Groups lets you collaborate with key stakeholders to ensure that everyone uses the right data.

data.name: Features_Section6_Heading
data.value: End chaos: Everyone on the same page

data.name: Features_Section7_Content
data.value: Keep on top of your data no matter where you are. With touch-enabled native apps for Windows, iOS, and Android, you can access all your data wherever you go.

data.name: Features_Section7_Heading
data.value: Make data-driven decisions, from anywhere

data.name: Features_Section8_Content
data.value: Use our open, standards-based REST API to integrate your application or service with Power BI. Integrating helps you deliver your solutions faster while focusing on your core value.

data.name: Features_Section8_Heading
data.value: Integrate with Power BI

data.name: Hero_Content
data.value: Power BI is a cloud-based business analytics service that gives you a single view of your most critical business data. Monitor the health of your business using a live dashboard, create rich interactive reports with Power BI Desktop and access your data on the go with native Power BI Mobile apps. It’s easy, fast, and free.

data.name: Hero_CTA
data.value: Take the tour

data.name: Hero_Heading
data.value: Any data, anywhere, any time

data.name: META_PAGETITLE
data.value: Features | Microsoft Power BI

data.name: Features_Section9_Content
data.value: Tell your data story with Power BI publish to web, and reach millions of users on any device, in any place. Combine your data sources, create stunning visualizations with ease, and embed your story on your website in minutes.

data.name: Features_Section9_Heading
data.value: Share your insights on your website or blog
